text: Sarah Laszloffy is a Republican member of the Montana Legislature. She was elected to House District 53 which represents the Billings area. Laszloffy served as a Majority Whip of the House during the 2015-2016 session. She was also chair of the Education Committee. == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Members of the Montana House of Representatives Category:Montana Republicans Category:People from Yellowstone County, Montana Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Sarah Laszloffy
